verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that they turn <WH7725> and encamp <WH2583> before <WH6440> Pihahiroth, <WH6367> between <WH996> Migdol <WH4024> and the sea, <WH3220> over <WH6440> against <WH6440> Baalzephon: <WH1189> before <WH5226> it shall you encamp <WH2583> by the sea. <WH3220>
For Pharaoh <WH6547> will say <WH559> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> They are entangled <WH943> in the land, <WH776> the wilderness <WH4057> has shut <WH5462> them in.

And I will harden <WH2388> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart, <WH3820> that he shall follow <WH7291> after <WH310> them; and I will be honored <WH3513> on Pharaoh, <WH6547> and on all his host; <WH2428> that the Egyptians <WH4714> may know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068> And they did <WH6213> so. <WH3651>

And it was told <WH5046> the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> that the people <WH5971> fled: <WH1272> and the heart <WH3824> of Pharaoh <WH6547> and of his servants <WH5650> was turned <WH2015> against <WH413> the people, <WH5971> and they said, <WH559> Why <WH4100> have we done <WH6213> this, <WH2063> that we have let Israel <WH3478> go <WH7971> from serving <WH5647> us?
And he made ready <WH631> his chariot, <WH7393> and took <WH3947> his people <WH5971> with him:

And he took <WH3947> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> chosen <WH970> chariots, <WH7393> and all <WH3605> the chariots <WH7393> of Egypt, <WH4714> and captains <WH7991> over <WH5921> every <WH3605> one of them.

And the LORD <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> the heart <WH3820> of Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and he pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH3318> out with an high <WH7311> hand. <WH3027>

But the Egyptians <WH4714> pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> them, all <WH3605> the horses <WH5483> and chariots <WH7393> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> and his horsemen, <WH6571> and his army, <WH2428> and overtook <WH5381> them encamping <WH2583> by the sea, <WH3220> beside <WH5921> Pihahiroth, <WH6367> before <WH6440> Baalzephon. <WH1189>

And when Pharaoh <WH6547> drew near, <WH7126> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> lifted <WH5375> up their eyes, <WH5869> and, behold, <WH2009> the Egyptians <WH4714> marched <WH5265> after <WH310> them; and they were sore <WH3966> afraid: <WH3372> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cried <WH6817> out to the LORD. <WH3068>

And they said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Because <WH1115> there were no <WH369> graves <WH6913> in Egypt, <WH4714> have you taken <WH3947> us away to die <WH4191> in the wilderness? <WH4057> why <WH4100> <WH2063> have you dealt <WH6213> thus <WH2063> with us, to carry <WH3318> us forth <WH3318> out of Egypt? <WH4714>

Is not this <WH2088> the word <WH1697> that we did tell <WH1696> you in Egypt, <WH4714> saying, <WH559> Let us alone, <WH2308> that we may serve <WH5647> the Egyptians? <WH4714> For it had been better <WH2896> for us to serve <WH5647> the Egyptians, <WH4714> than that we should die <WH4191> in the wilderness. <WH4057>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> Fear <WH3372> you not, stand <WH3320> still, and see <WH7200> the salvation <WH3444> of the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> he will show <WH6213> to you to day: <WH3117> for the Egyptians <WH4714> whom <WH834> you have seen <WH7200> to day, <WH3117> you shall see <WH7200> them again <WH3254> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> for ever. <WH5769>
The LORD <WH3068> shall fight <WH3898> for you, and you shall hold <WH2790> your peace. <WH2790>
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Why <WH4100> cry <WH6817> you to me? speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that they go <WH5265> forward: <WH5265>

But lift <WH7311> you up your rod, <WH4294> and stretch <WH5186> out your hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> the sea, <WH3220> and divide <WH1234> it: and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall go <WH935> on dry <WH3004> ground through <WH8432> the middle <WH8432> of the sea. <WH3220>

And I, behold, <WH2005> I will harden <WH2388> the hearts <WH3820> of the Egyptians, <WH4714> and they shall follow <WH310> them: and I will get <WH3513> me honor <WH3513> on Pharaoh, <WH6547> and on all <WH3605> his host, <WH2428> on his chariots, <WH7393> and on his horsemen. <WH6571>
And the Egyptians <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD, <WH3068> when I have gotten <WH7408> me honor <WH3513> on Pharaoh, <WH6547> on his chariots, <WH7393> and on his horsemen. <WH6571>

And the angel <WH4397> of God, <WH430> which went <WH1980> before <WH6440> the camp <WH4264> of Israel, <WH3478> removed <WH5265> and went <WH3212> behind <WH310> them; and the pillar <WH5982> of the cloud <WH6051> went <WH5265> from before <WH6440> their face, and stood <WH5975> behind <WH310> them:

And it came <WH935> between <WH996> the camp <WH4264> of the Egyptians <WH4714> and the camp <WH4264> of Israel; <WH3478> and it was a cloud <WH6051> and darkness <WH2822> to them, but it gave light <WH216> by night <WH3915> to these: so that the one <WH2088> came <WH7126> not near <WH7126> the other <WH2088> all <WH3605> the night. <WH3915>

And Moses <WH4872> stretched <WH5186> out his hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> the sea; <WH3220> and the LORD <WH3068> caused the sea <WH3220> to go <WH3212> back by a strong <WH5794> east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> all <WH3605> that night, <WH3915> and made <WH7760> the sea <WH3220> dry <WH2724> land, and the waters <WH4325> were divided. <WH1234>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH935> into the middle <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220> on the dry <WH3004> ground: and the waters <WH4325> were a wall <WH2346> to them on their right <WH3225> hand, <WH3225> and on their left. <WH8040>

And the Egyptians <WH4714> pursued, <WH7291> and went <WH935> in after <WH310> them to the middle <WH8432> of the sea, <WH3220> even all <WH3605> Pharaoh's <WH6547> horses, <WH5483> his chariots, <WH7393> and his horsemen. <WH6571>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, that in the morning <WH1242> watch <WH821> the LORD <WH3068> looked <WH8259> to the host <WH4264> of the Egyptians <WH4714> through the pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> and of the cloud, <WH6051> and troubled <WH2000> the host <WH4264> of the Egyptians, <WH4714>

And took <WH5493> off their chariot <WH4818> wheels, <WH212> that they drove <WH5090> them heavily: <WH3517> so that the Egyptians <WH4714> said, <WH559> Let us flee <WH5127> from the face <WH6440> of Israel; <WH3478> for the LORD <WH3068> fights <WH3898> for them against the Egyptians. <WH4714>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Stretch <WH5186> out your hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> the sea, <WH3220> that the waters <WH4325> may come <WH7725> again <WH7725> on the Egyptians, <WH4714> on their chariots, <WH7393> and on their horsemen. <WH6571>

And Moses <WH4872> stretched <WH5186> forth his hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> the sea, <WH3220> and the sea <WH3220> returned <WH7725> to his strength <WH386> when the morning <WH1242> appeared; <WH6437> and the Egyptians <WH4714> fled <WH5127> against <WH7125> it; and the LORD <WH3068> overthrew <WH5287> the Egyptians <WH4714> in the middle <WH8432> of the sea. <WH3220>

And the waters <WH4325> returned, <WH7725> and covered <WH3680> the chariots, <WH7393> and the horsemen, <WH6571> and all <WH3605> the host <WH2428> of Pharaoh <WH6547> that came <WH935> into the sea <WH3220> after <WH310> them; there remained <WH7604> not so <WH5704> much <WH5704> as one <WH259> of them.

But the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> walked <WH1980> on dry <WH3004> land in the middle <WH8432> of the sea; <WH3220> and the waters <WH4325> were a wall <WH2346> to them on their right <WH3225> hand, <WH3225> and on their left. <WH8040>

Thus the LORD <WH3068> saved <WH3467> Israel <WH3478> that day <WH3117> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians; <WH4714> and Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> the Egyptians <WH4714> dead <WH4191> on the sea <WH3220> shore. <WH8193>

And Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> that great <WH1419> work <WH3027> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> did <WH6213> on the Egyptians: <WH4714> and the people <WH5971> feared <WH3372> the LORD, <WH3068> and believed <WH539> the LORD, <WH3068> and his servant <WH5650> Moses. <WH4872>
